title: Package Version Tracker
description: Package managers need to validate dependency versions. These versions have major and minor numbers separated by a dot, optionally followed by a patch number. Match valid version numbers like 1.2 or 1.2.3 but not incomplete versions.
solutionSummary: Uses anchors ^ and $ for complete match, \d+ for major.minor versions, escaped dot \., and optional patch group (\.\d+)?. Demonstrates optional groups and complete string matching.
